I hope you had a great weekend. Did you get the email I sent last week? Just sending a reminder about the opportunity to schedule a discovery call related to our Sourcewell GPS Telematics to see what fits your organization's needs and budget. Please let me know if you are interested or if there is a different person I should connect with. I look forward to speaking with you.
Thanks,
{!User.Username} Account Executive WEX Inc. 97 Darling Avenue, So. Portland, ME 04106 {!User.Phone} www.wexinc.com
